mapper.insert: insert into salary (id, time_one, salary_one, time_two, salary_two, time_three, salary_three) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{timeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salaryOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salaryTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{timeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salaryThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update salary set time_one = #{timeOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary_one = #{salaryOne,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_two = #{timeTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary_two = #{salaryTwo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, time_three = #{timeThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salary_three = #{salaryThree,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, time_one, salary_one, time_two, salary_two, time_three, salary_three from salary
